Configuring
Configuring / Setting system properties
Setting system properties
System properties apply to the overall RICOH ProcessDirector environment, which includes the primary server and any application/secondary
servers. Some of the properties apply to all the jobs that RICOH ProcessDirector creates.
To set system properties:
1. Click the Administration tab.
2. In the left pane, click Settings â‡’ System.
3. Enter values for the properties that you want to change.
4. Click SAVE.
Parent topic: Configuring
